name: Donut Drop
description:
Pastries have become fed up of the success of donuts, especially after one was brought to the ISS. Survive the trip back down to Earth for the glory of all donuts! Dodge waves of enemy pastries in the story mode or see how long you can survive in the endless mode.

Made for Mini Jam 56, implementing the themes "sky," "war zone," and "doughnut."
